title: Extrapolations
creator: Scott Z. Burns
executive_producers: Scott Z. Burns, Michael Ellenberg, Dorothy Fortenberry, Gregory Jacobs, Lindsey Springer
storyline: An anthology series that depicts the effects of climate change on the planet through various different points of view through interconnected stories.

title: Snowpiercer
creator: Josh Friendman, Graeme Manson
production: CJ Entertainment, Dog Fish Films, Tomorrow Studios
executive_producers: Scott Derrickson, Park Chan-wook, Marty Adelstein, James Hawes
storyline: An anthology series that depicts the effects of climate change on the planet through various different points of view through interconnected stories.

title: The Expanse
creator: Mark Fergus, Hawk Ostby
production: Alcon Television Group, Hivemind, Amazon Studios, Just So, SeanDanielCo, Penguin in a Parka
executive_producers: Mark Fergus, Hawk Ostby, Sean Daniel, Jason F. Brown, Sharon Hall, Broderick Johnson, Andrew Kosove, Laura Lancaster, Daniel Abraham, Ty Franck, Dan Nowak, Ben Roberts
storyline: Two hundred years from now the solar system has been colonized, and police detective Josephus Miller is given the assignment of finding an important missing woman. Meanwhile, an officer of an ice freighter sees what appears to be an unprovoked attack upon the ship by a craft from Mars. As news of the attack spreads, the incident's repercussions threaten to destabilize an already tenuous relationship between Earth, Mars and the asteroid belt.

title: Terra Nova
creator: Kelly Marcel, Craig Silverstein
production: Amblin Television, Chernin Entertainment, Kapital Entertainment, Siesta Productions, 20th Century Fox Television
executive_producers: Steven Spielberg, Peter Chernin, René Echevarria, Brannon Braga, Jon Cassar, Aaron Kaplan, Katherine Pope, Darryl Frank, Justin Falvey, Alex Graves, Craig Silverstein, Kely Marcel
storyline: In 2149, earth is nearly wrecked by pollution. Police detective Jim Shannon is jailed for illegally raising an extra child, Zoe. He's sprung from jail just in time to join his family on the latest 'pilgrimage', through a unique time-space-continuum rip, to Terra Nova, a colony run with modern technology in a dino age forest. Colony commander Nathaniel Taylor soon recruits as security professional Jim, who gradually finds out about some threats, notably from Saurian monsters, the 'sixers' and his own, bitterly estranged son Lucas. Meanwhile Jim's son Josh keeps getting into trouble, mainly due to his girlfriend Skye. His smart sister Maddy is in love with gentleman soldier Mark Reynolds.

title: The 100
creator: Jason Rothenberg
production: Alloy Entertainment, CBS Television Studios, Warner Bros. Television, Bonanza Productionss
executive_producers: Jason Rothenberg, Leslie Morgenstein, Bruce Miller, Matt Miller, Gina Girolamo, Bharat Nalluri, Elizabeth Craft, Sarah Fain, Cheryl Dolans, Dean White, Kim Shumway, Ed Fraiman, Jeff Vlaming
storyline: Set 97 years after a nuclear war destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends 100 juvenile delinquents back to Earth, hoping to repopulate the planet.

title: Dark Angel
creator: James Cameron, Charles H. Eglee
executive_producers: James Cameron, Charles H. Eglee, René Echevarria
storyline: A group of genetically-enhanced children escape from a lab project. Years later we meet Max, one of the escapees who now works for a messenger service in the post-apocalyptic Pacific Northwest.

title: Fortitude
creator: Simon Donald
executive_producers: Simon Donald, Anne Mensah, Cameron Roach, Patrick Spence, Frith Tiplady, Andrew Woodhead
storyline: Fortitude is a place like nowhere else on Earth. Surrounded by the savage beauty of the polar landscape, its future sparkling with the promise of Arctic opportunity, wealth and discovery, Fortitude is one of the safest towns on earth. There has never been a violent crime here. Until now.

title: Hilda
creator: Luke Pearson
production: Atomic Cartoons, Mercury Filmworks, Nobrow Press, Flying Eye Brooks, Silvergate Media
executive_producers: Kurt Mueller, Luke Pearson, Stephanie Simpson, Clint Eland, Bryan Korn
storyline: Hilda is an 11-year-old girl who grew up with her mother in a cabin on the edge of the woods near the walled-in city of Trolberg. Over the course of the series, she and her deerfox Twig, later accompanied by an elf named Alfur, and friends David and Frida, go on a number of adventures interacting with and befriending the mysterious animals, people, and spirits that live in and around the city of Trolberg.

title: After the Flood
creator: Mick Ford
executive_producers: Richard Fee, Mick Ford, Huw Kennair-Jones, Nicola Shindler
storyline: Joanna finds an unidentified man dead in a lift in a underground car park after a devastating flood, police assumes that he became trapped as the waters rose, but she is obsessed with discovering what happened to him.

title: Families Like Ours
creator: Thomas Vinterberg
production: StudioCanal, Canal+, TV 2, Film i Väst, Zentropa Entertainments Saga Film
executive_producers: Anna Marsh, Ron Halpern, Jennifer Green, Katrine Vogelsang, Olivier Bibas, Morgane Perrolier, Louise Gigon, Elisabeth Tangen, Johanna Lind, Claudia Grässel, Sebastian Lückel, Christoph Pellander
storyline: In a not-too-distant future, Denmark faces total evacuation due to rising water levels. As the nation prepares to leave their homes, high school student Laura must choose between her divorced parents and the boy she's fallen in love with.

title: The Swarm
creator: Barbara Eder
executive_producers: Frank Doelger, Eric welbers, Mark Huffam, Ute Leonhardt, Jan Wünschmann, Til Grönemeyer, Barbara Eder, Luke Watson
storyline: The global environmental thriller is set in the present day, where anomalies and unnatural behavior in marine animals are causing upheaval all over the world. The Swarm follows a global group of scientists who come together to tackle one of the biggest challenges mankind has ever faced. They make the chilling discovery that deep at the bottom of the sea resides a collective intelligence which has suffered the ravages of civilization on its habitat - and decided to fight back.

title: The Rig
creator: David Macpherson
production: Wild Mercury Productions, Amazon MGM Studios
executive_producers: Derek Wax, John Strickland, Suzanne Reid
storyline: The drama will be set on the Kinloch Bravo oil rig, stationed off the Scottish coast in the dangerous waters of the North Sea. When the crew is due to return to the mainland, a mysterious and all-enveloping fog rolls through and they find themselves cut off from all communication with the shore and the outside world. As the rig is hit by massive tremors, its upto the crew of the Endeavor to discover what's driving the unknown force. But a major accident forces them to ask questions about who they can really trust.

title: Foundation
creator: David S. Goyer, Josh Friedman
executive_producers: David S. Goyer, David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Bill Bost, Robyn Asimov, Marcy Ross, Josh Friedman, Cameron Welsh
storyline: Far in the future, The Empire is about to face a reckoning unlike anything else it's faced before: several millennia of chaos have been predicted by the galaxy's leading psycho-historian, Hari Seldon. But can The Empire offset the disaster before it begins?

creator: Pedro Aguilera
storyline: A world divided into progress and devastation. The link between the two sides - Offshore and Inland - is a rigorous and painstaking system called The Process. Everyone in Inland has a chance to go through The Process to live a better life in Offshore. But only 3% make it through.

title: Scavengers Reign
creator: Joseph Bennett, Charles Huettner
executive_producers: Joseph Bennett, Charles Huettner, Chris Prynoski, Ben Kalina, Antonia Canobbio, Sean buckelew, James Merrill
storyline: The remaining crew of a damaged interstellar freighter ship find themselves stranded on a beautiful, yet unforgiving alien planet where they must survive long enough to escape or be rescued. As the survivors struggle to locate their downed ship and missing crewmates, their new home reveals a hostile world allowed to thrive without human interference.

title: Toxic Town
creator: Jack Thorne, Amy Trigg
executive_producers: Annabel Jones, Jack Thorne, Minkie Spiro
storyline: When dozens of babies in Corby are born with disabilities, their mothers embark on a battle to hold those responsible to account.

title: The Jengaburu Curse
creator: Nila Madhab Panda
storyline: A London-based analyst returns to Odisha in search of her missing father. Her quest leads to a conspiracy involving bauxite mining, secretly backed by an international nexus, leading to unexplained deaths and a displaced community.
